channel.title: Having trouble compling and running my server (JDK)
channel.description:
hi i have jdk 3 and 2 i have a server source too and when i click runserver it comes to a black screen for one sec.. i have no-ip and i have changed the varibales to PATH/CLASSPATH but i need help complieing because when i look on forums there most likely differnt
i have not portforwarded/ if u know whats going on please tell me

item.title: Having trouble compling and running my server (JDK)
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Yep I had the same problem when you click run and it just closes but I saw that I changed the classpath and path wrong so go to here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html

And follow the class path/path/temp guide and change the 2s to 3s and if that doesn’t work then just use jdk 2. And evilclown611 your message is to short its considered SPAM.

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble compling and running my server (JDK)
